data.title: Santosh new resume

data.text: 1. Santosh K. Shukla H.N.55 A, E-54 Molarband Ext. Badarpur, New Delhi 110044 Cell: (+91) 9990016580 Email: shuklasantu5@gmail.com Career Objective: A position as a Media Broadcasting where I can make effective use of my skills and abilities towards achieving the goals of the organization. Areas of Interest:  One years of experience in Broadcasting programs  Good time management and problem solving skills  Excellent verbal and written command over English and Hindi  Positive attitude, good reporting and creative skills Technical skills:  Proficient in Microsoft word, PowerPoint and excel  Internet savvy  Extensive knowledge of different Application  English and Hindi typing Educational Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Computer Application, University of Bhopal (MCU) in the year 2013 Professional Experience: Paras TV Channel, Faridabad From July 2013 to till date MCR executive  Handled the tasks of broadcast  Handled the Air-box, Title-box, Adobe Flash Media Live Encoder  Conducted live broadcasting on Television (Live-U)  Update all information to the particular Person or senior Date……. ( Santosh )
